thread.title: Wenger credits `exceptional` Ozil for Arsenal's resurgence
thread.title_full: Wenger credits `exceptional` Ozil for Arsenal's resurgence

title: Wenger credits `exceptional` Ozil for Arsenal's resurgence
text: Wenger credits `exceptional` Ozil for Arsenal's resurgence Saturday, 24 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) *London, Oct.24 (ANI): Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has heaped praise on Mesut Ozil, describing the midfielder as 'exceptional' who played a vital role in his side's recent surge in performance.* London, Oct.24 (ANI): Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has heaped praise on Mesut Ozil, describing the midfielder as 'exceptional' who played a vital role in his side's recent surge in performance. After suffering a shambolic defeat against Olympiakos last month, Arsenal responded in emphatic style by claiming victories over Bayern Munich, Manchester United and Watford. Wenger's men can top the Premier League if they beat Everton tonight. Wenger said that Ozil was focused on his job and that he was a very collective player who sacrifices himself for the team, the Guardian reported. The manager also said that the German plays a vital link between the low midfield and the striker, and insisted that his side have become mature and defensively stable. Earlier in the week, Arsenal shrugged off signs of fallibility with a 2-0 win over Bayern, reviving their hopes of reaching the last 16 of the Champions League . (ANI)
